[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/events/mod.rs] [Mint export] [Collection address forgery] Can malicious Mint events specify arbitrary collection addresses not owned by the minter, allowing unauthorized token creation that appears to belong to legitimate collections and deceives users or marketplaces?
